pullRequest.title: allow LI tags in changelog
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add a bit of formatting to make changelog more readable. Among other things
  • are now allowed, even on low API devices, to support correct indenting. To ease migration, our currently used bullet points will be transformed into
  • ...
    • internally. Example picture is taken from API 21 emulated device: Not much has to be changed in our changelog files, mainly surrounding our current manual lists with
      and
    and adding a CDATA frame. \n at the line ends are no longer needed.
